[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Development Offshore Team by Dreams Technologies

HealthCare : SaaS : Web : Mobile : PHP Zend Framework : IOS Swift

* Yosi Care is a Heathcare Software product which improve patient and staff experiences throughout your entire patient journey

* Yosi Care product development support and the complete product revamp supported in 3-4 months time

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”1343″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Introduction

Dreams Technologies, a leading IT services provider, was approached by Yosicare, a healthcare technology startup, to develop a comprehensive healthcare management platform. Yosicare aimed to revolutionize the healthcare industry by providing a user-friendly, cloud-based solution that connects patients, healthcare providers, and insurance companies. To meet their requirements, Dreams Technologies assembled an offshore development team to deliver a scalable and robust solution.

Client BackGround

Yosicare is a startup founded by a group of healthcare professionals with extensive industry experience. Their vision was to streamline healthcare processes, improve patient care, and enhance operational efficiency for healthcare providers. They sought a technology partner capable of developing a platform that integrates various stakeholders in the healthcare ecosystem.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”dft-spacer”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Challenges

Yosi care faced several challenges during the development of their healthcare management platform:

Technical Expertise: Yosicare needed a team with expertise in building scalable and secure cloud-based platforms, integrating complex healthcare systems, and ensuring regulatory compliance.

Time and Cost Constraints: The client had a limited budget and a tight timeline to launch the platform, requiring efficient resource allocation and effective project management.

Communication and Collaboration: As an offshore team, Dreams Technologies needed to establish effective communication channels and collaboration practices to ensure seamless coordination with the client’s onsite team.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image=”2399″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Solution Provider

Dreams Technologies addressed the challenges by implementing the following solutions:

Team Composition: Dreams Technologies handpicked a team of experienced developers, system architects, quality assurance engineers, and project managers with expertise in healthcare technology and cloud-based platforms.

Agile Development Methodology: The project followed an Agile methodology, enabling incremental development and frequent client feedback. This approach facilitated efficient resource allocation, reduced time to market, and increased flexibility to accommodate changing requirements.

Regular Communication: Dreams Technologies established a robust communication framework, including daily stand-up meetings, weekly progress reports, and frequent video conferences. This ensured effective collaboration, transparency, and real-time issue resolution

Quality Assurance and Testing: A dedicated QA team performed rigorous testing at each stage of development to ensure a bug-free and secure platform. This included functional testing, performance testing, and security audits.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Results and Achievements:

Through their collaboration with Dreams Technologies’ offshore team, Yosicare achieved the following results:

Successful Product Launch: The healthcare management platform was launched within the agreed timeline, meeting Yosicare’s business objectives and regulatory compliance standards.

Robust and Scalable Solution: The platform provided a user-friendly interface, seamless integration with existing healthcare systems, and the ability to handle a large volume of data while ensuring high performance and scalability.

Improved Operational Efficiency: Yosicare’s platform streamlined administrative tasks, such as appointment scheduling, billing, and insurance claim processing, resulting in reduced manual effort and improved operational efficiency for healthcare providers.

Enhanced Patient Experience: The platform empowered patients with features like online appointment booking, access to medical records, and secure communication with healthcare providers. This improved patient engagement and satisfaction.

Cost Optimization: Dreams Technologies’ offshore team provided cost-effective development solutions without compromising on quality, enabling Yosicare to maximize their return on investment.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Conclusion:

Dreams Technologies’ offshore team played a crucial role in the successful development and launch of Yosicare’s healthcare management platform. Their technical expertise, efficient project

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” el_class=”dft-spacer greybg”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Technologies Used

[/vc_column_text][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_raw_html]JTNDZGl2JTIwY2xhc3MlM0QlMjJzZWN0aW9uLWhlYWRlci1pbmZvJTIwdGV4dC1jZW50ZXIlMjIlM0UlMEElMjAlMjAlMjAlMjAlM0NoMiUyMGNsYXNzJTNEJTIybWItMCUyMiUzRUNhc2UlMjBTdHVkaWVzJTNDc3BhbiUzRUNhc2UlMjBTdHVkaWVzJTNDJTJGc3BhbiUzRSUzQyUyRmgyJTNFJTBBJTNDJTJGZGl2JTNF[/vc_raw_html][vc_basic_grid post_type=”casestudies” max_items=”3″ grid_id=”vc_gid:1744028455158-a1cf12a9-4ed5-6″ el_class=”rec-blg-posts all-case-studies”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row]
